                            _______________

                             USING SLIP-39
                            _______________


SLIP-39 support for Hardware Wallets that natively support it, such as
your Trezor "Model T".  Recover your Cryptocurrency accounts to your
hardware wallet directly from these SLIP-39 cards, by entering them on
the screen of the device.

- Collect these "SLIP-39" Card Mnemonics, with sufficient:
  - Different Groups to satisfy Recovery Card Groups threshold
  - Cards in each Group to meet each groups' recovery minimums
- Enter recovery mode on your hardware wallet
- Restore your Cryptocurrency accounts to your hardware wallet by
  entering the SLIP-39 Mnemonic phrases.
